amuse.nodes.classifier.interfaces
Interface ClassifierInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
LinearDiscriminantAnalysisAdapter, RapidMinerModelLoader
public interface ClassifierInterface

This interface defines the operations which should be supported by all classifiers.

Method Detail

classify

void classify(java.lang.String pathToModelFile)
              throws NodeException
Classifies the music data from ClassificationConfiguration of the corresponding scheduler. Labels are written directly to this data set

Parameters:
pathToModelFile - Path to classification model file
Throws:
NodeException
